# MCP Tool Shop

> AI tools for developers — Organization website and documentation hub

## Overview

This is the GitHub Pages website for the MCP Tool Shop organization. It provides documentation, guides, and resources for all MCP Tool Shop projects.

## Organization

MCP Tool Shop builds production-grade MCP servers for the agentic future:

### Discovery & Orchestration
- **Tool Compass** — Semantic MCP tool discovery (115+ tools)
- **File Compass** — Semantic file search with HNSW indexing

### AI Generation
- **Comfy-Headless** — Production ComfyUI client with video generation
- **Backpropagate** — Headless LLM fine-tuning framework
- **Voice Soundboard** — AI-powered TTS with 54+ voices

### Code Intelligence
- **Dev-Brain** — MCP server for test generation, security audits
- **Integradio** — Vector-embedded Gradio components

### Security
- **Tool-Scan** — Security scanner for MCP tools
- **MCP-Stress-Test** — Red team toolkit for scanner testing

### Infrastructure
- **Context Window Manager** — Lossless context restoration via KV cache
- **Headless Wheel Builder** — Universal Python wheel builder
- **Claude Collaborate** — Human-AI collaboration sandbox

### Research
- **ASPIRE-AI** — Teaching AI judgment through adversarial mentorship

## Links

- Organization: https://github.com/mcp-tool-shop
- Website: https://mcp-tool-shop.github.io
- All Repositories: https://github.com/orgs/mcp-tool-shop/repositories
